titles.title: Let Children Hear The Mighty Deeds

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Let children hear the mighty deeds Which God performed of old; Which in our younger years we saw, And which our fathers told.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: He bids us make His glories known, His works of pow'r and grace; And we'll convey His wonders down Through every rising race.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Our lips shall tell them to our sons, And they again to theirs; That generations yet unborn May teach them to their heirs.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Thus shall they learn in God alone Their hope securely stands, That they may ne'er forget His work But practice His commands.
